welcomePage.Set goals and actually conquer them: Set goals and actually conquer them
welcomePage.description: The key to achieving your goals is to break them down into bite-sized action steps. Want to make $5k/month… what products or services are you going to offer? Want 1000 Instagram followers… how are you going to connect with them? Start with your yearly goals and then break them down into quarters, months, weeks, and days, all with checklists to keep you on track.
welcomePage.About Project: This project was made as part of the React course from the community The Rolling Scopes.

RSS.Free course from The Rolling Scopes comm: Free course from The Rolling Scopes community.
RSS.The course is intended: The course is intended for RS School 2021Q3 students who have passed RS School stage #2, as well as for new students who have knowledge and practical experience in using the following technologies and tools
RSS.Principle: The principle of 'Pay it forward' works at RS School.
RSS.We share our knowledge: We share our knowledge with students for free now, hoping that in the future they will return to us as mentors and pass on their knowledge to the next generation of students in the same way.
RSS.Webinars are held: Webinars are held 2 times a week in the evening. A recording of the webinars will be available on the school's YouTube channel.
RSS.Everyone: Everyone can study at RS School, regardless of age, professional employment and place of residence. However, for successful learning, you need to have basic knowledge.
RSS.Certificate of successful: A certificate of successful completion of the course is issued to all who have passed the two stages of training.
RSS.All materials: All materials will be hosted in the public domain on
RSS.Open chat: Open chat for applicants and students:
